name: Snatch Bat
description: The Snatch Bat is a medium-sized aberration known for its chaotic neutral alignment, featuring a sleek body adapted for ambush and flight.
memorable: It can pilfer items from its prey with ease, using its agility to evade attacks.
goals: To ambush and steal valuable items from unsuspecting creatures.
relations: Individuals often encounter them near treasure and other creatures that might guard valuable loot.
environment: Typically found in areas where treasure is present, such as caverns or ruins.
strengths: Fast flying ability, capable of avoiding opportunity attacks, and possesses treasure detection skills.
weaknesses: Lower mental attributes make it vulnerable to mind-affecting spells.
attacks: Uses swift claw attacks for slashing damage, and a unique pilfering bite that can steal items instead of dealing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Treasure Sense allows it to detect and locate valuable items by scent.
senses: Blindsight out to 60 feet allows it to detect enemies even in darkness.
skills: Average Perception allows it to notice subtle details in its environment.
additional_information: Immunity to conditions like blinded and charmed increases survivability.
Ability to steal non-weapon items weighing no more than 10 pounds.
Requires regurgitating stolen items before stealing again.
test_queries: flying ambush predator that steals items
chaotic creature with treasure detection ability
swift bat that can pilfer small objects
agile monster known for stealing hats
